section.45: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Malik reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:He, who brought up two girls properly till they grew up, he and I would come (together) (very closely) on the Day of Resurrection, and he interlaced his fingers (for explaining the point of nearness between him and that person)
